content: k6 *slip 1 purlwise yarn in front yo p1* repeat from * to * to last 6 sts k6 row 2 k6 *k1 yo slip 2 purlwise yarn at back * repeat from * to * to last 6 sts k6 row 3 k6 *slip 3 purlwise yarn at front p1* repeat from * to * to last 6 sts k6 row 4 k6 *k1 knit the 3 slipped sts together* repeat from * to * to last 6 sts k6 row 5 k6 *p1 slip 1 purlwise yarn in front yo* repeat from * to * to last 6 sts k6 row 6 k6 *yo slip 2 purlwise yarn at back k1* repeat from * to * to last 6 sts k6 row 7 k6 *p1 slip 3 purlwise yarn in front * repeat from * to * to last 6 sts k6 row 8 k6 *knit the 3 slipped sts together k1* repeat from * to * to last 6 sts k6 row 9 16 repeat row 1 8 row 17 knit all sts row 18 k6 purl to last 6 k6 repeat moss section repeat mesh section repeat ridge section repeat seed stitch section repeat caterpillar section final garter border row 1 10 knit all sts bind o cid 431 and weave in ends
